thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 2 of 1703
thread.title: Stefanie

author: Stefanie
title: Stefanie
text: I really liked how easy it was to find a good flight with a cheap price on flighthub. You saw which airline you use and the exact arrival and Departure dates and times. I just missed a little bit that you can't see which airlines allows you to take a free baggage or something with you. So for this information you must search again. But all in one it is a really nice page and I will use it again in the future.
